text: Raymond Peter "Ray" Kogovsek (August 19, 1941 - April 30, 2017) was an American politician. He served as a member of the United States House of Representatives representing Colorado's 3rd congressional district from January 3, 1979 through January 3, 1985. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He then served in the Colorado Senate from 1974 to 1978. Kogovsek was born in Pueblo, Colorado. He studied at the University of Denver. Kogovsek died in Pueblo, Colorado on April 30, 2017 at the age of 75.'Former U.S. congressman and proud Puebloan Ray Kogovsek dies at 75,' The Pueblo Chieftain, Steve Hanson, May 1, 2017 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1941 births Category:2017 deaths Category:United States representatives from Colorado Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Pueblo, Colorado
